India's most comprehensive Healthcare Initiative for K-12 Schools

An initiative by BJ Medical College and IIT Bombay Alumni

Who We Are

We are a group of young and dynamic professionals belonging to diverse backgrounds like healthcare, psychology, preventive medicine, technology; and everyone who connects with our mission: “To make every Indian school a health-promoting school”. Having graduated from premiere institutes like B.J. Medical College & Sassoon General Hospitals, Pune , IIT Powai and having guidance from seniors who are pioneers of their streams of work we believe we deliver the best healthcare services.

Read more

WHAT WE OFFER

24/7 Campus Safety

It is mandatory to have the emergency facilities in educational institutions. But at HealthCop, we have taken a step further by providing physical, mental, emotional and sexual health

Read More

Mental
Healthcare

Mental health — an essential part of children’s overall health — has a complex interactive relationship with their physical health and their ability to succeed in school, at work and in society. 

Read More

Preventive Healthcare

Preventive healthcare is more important than treating a child after an illness. There is enough scientific data that emphasises on importance of preventive healthcare thus proving the age old golden idiom ‘PREVENTION IS BETTER THAN CURE.’

Read More

Health
Checkups

We observe Global standards of hygiene, clinical assessment and reporting during health checkup. Annual health checkup is done by a team of 6+ specialist doctors(pediatrician, ophthalmologist, dentist, psychiatrist, etc.)

Read More
